channel.title: [Client help] Need help with customizing client
channel.description:
Hello everyone, I've recently made a little server for me and some friends And I was wondering how to customize the client. I did customize the background But I was wondering how to customize the color of the text when it says "unpacking blah blah blah" and also the little red bar that loads. And Also if someone could help me the client I have it is from the client One-Scape and I was wondering how to change the text at the very top that say One-Scape client V5.5 . Thank you.
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/24w8pwp.png[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/352np1c.png[/img]

item.title: [Client help] Need help with customizing client
item.dc:creator: @Billy_Mays Billy Mays
item.description:
@Billy_Mays wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:2, topic:406406”]Well try to add @red@ @blu@ or w.e, if it’s PI idk if it’ll work with Delta because I never worked with Delta. Like this
Gui.java

Thank you so much The private string thing worked. rep for you.

Read full topic
item.source: [Client help] Need help with customizing client
